metadata.title: CVE-2023-28636 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a free asset and IT management software package. Starting inversion 0.60 and prior to versions 9.5.13 and 10.0.7, a vulnerabilityallows an administrator to create a malicious external link. This issue isfixed in versions 9.5.13 and 10.0.7.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
